Notes

Pressed on 180g "blood-red" vinyl. Contains a booklet with lyrics and photos, a poster (showing the map of the kingdom of Elda), a double-sided printed insert with download code, label releases and the front cover. Mixed by [...] in [...] in Germany. Drums recorded in "The Cave" winter solstice MMXX. All other instruments and vocals recorded at World Famous Studios by candlelight to 2 inch tape in Spring MMXXI except: Primary keyboards recorded and programmed in The Wood Lake by [...] and [...]. Narration recorded in The Keep by [...].
